Title: Bailout
Plot: Leslie is determined to help a local video store stay in business. Chris offers Tom advice on how to deal with a difficult employee. Ann resorts to blackmail to get April to be her friend.
GuestStars: Jason Schwartzman, Ben Schwartz, Jenny Slate, James Greene, Kirk Fox, Mara Marini, Kevin Symons, Jay Jackson, Yvans Jourdain, Joe Mande, Craig Shoemaker, Gary Kraus, Christopher Frontiero, Jelani Quinn, Jake Ellio
